column4: Hi. I remember when I installed ubuntu a while ago (I think 7.04) during live install I had to select different things like keyboard/video card drivers and all. Do I still ahve to perform these steps with Gutsy?
Also, how do you know which video card driver to choose? All the names are pretty much random
I didn't install ubuntu yet. I'm afraid I will get stuck in installation and won't know how to proceed. Especially with no windows installed :P
